attributes.action: Do not work with Donald trump - his policies are an abuse of human rights.
attributes.additional_details: Show the world Britain is strong and does not need to go along with such awful rhetoric to maintain our strength.
attributes.background: Donald trump made some horrendous campaign pledges, which are an abuse to human rights. He has signed gagging orders, and has or is planning to sign legislation which is racist, xenophobic, sexist and homophobic.
